description:
Viola gets the urge to bake cookies, and she decides to make them into fun shapes. Then, Alyssa and Viola try to help the Sandmann with a problem.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Circumstances of Yep - Oops - of Course These Are Pastries! / The Insomnia Circumstances of the Sleep Fairy
Un, Kore wa Yakigashi Da yo!? To Iu Jijou / Nemuri no Sei no Fumin Jijou
うん, これは焼き菓子だよ!? という事情 / 眠りの精の不眠事情
